descriptionHtml:
[CENTER][SIZE=7][COLOR=#ff0000][FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium]The Claw [/FONT][/COLOR][/SIZE][COLOR=#0070c0][FONT=Arial Narrow][SIZE=5]by Standalone09[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/CENTER]

[CENTER][SIZE=5][COLOR=#e5e0ec][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/44441/?]My other Epic Mod![/URL][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER]

[CENTER][IMG]http://holybibletext.com/divider.png[/IMG][/CENTER]

[FONT=Garamond][SIZE=5][COLOR=#938953]Feature:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

[youtube]vmTRcL8fbWI[/youtube]
video by izon87604 thanks dude!

[FONT=Garamond][SIZE=5][COLOR=#938953]Description:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

So here you have a custom hand made dagger of awesomeneesseses :D

Stats same as daedric dagger oneÂ´s and also available under the daedric crafting category 
thought in the beginning to make it a quest reward from Lucan(you know him) but then i realized i have no fking clue how to do that so if someone is willing to \"update\" the dagger to add him to the quest pls contact me :)

[FONT=Garamond][SIZE=5][COLOR=#938953]Install:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

1.Extract the archive
2.Copy the contents of the archive in your Skyrim\\Data folder
3.Open the Skyrim launcher or your mod manager of choice and check the Claw.esp 

[FONT=Garamond][SIZE=5][COLOR=#938953]Uninstall:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

1.Uncheck the esp plugin
2.Delete all files that came with the mod


[CENTER][IMG]http://holybibletext.com/divider.png[/IMG][/CENTER]


Do NOT modify/reupload/edit/sell any asset in this mod without my permission. Have fun!
author: standalone09
